column2: "Na Juda ɔman no nyinara faa Uzia a oedzi mfe duesia
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen wɔ n'egya Amazia n'ananmu."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔkyekyeer Elot
column3: na ɔdanee maa Juda
column4: n'ekyir no ɔhen no kɔr ne nsamankyir."

column2: "Aber a Uzia ridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe duesia; na odzii hen mfe eduonum ebien wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Jekilia
column3: ofi Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n'egya Amazia yɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔdze sii n'enyi do dɛ ɔrohwehwɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ Zekaria a ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn enyido adzehu mu ntseasee no
column3: ne nda no nyinara mu: na mber tsentsen a ɔhwehwɛɛ EWURADZE no

column2: "Na ofiir edzi nye Filistiafo kɔkoe
column3: na obubuu Gat fasu
column5: na Ashdod fasu no; na ɔkyekyeer nkurow wɔ Ashdod man mu

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn buae tsiaa Filistiafo no
column3: na Arabiafo a wɔtsetse Gur-baal

column2: "Na Ammonfo dze akyɛdze brɛɛ Uzia: na ne dzin tahyee araa dze kodur Egypt ahɛnee mu mpo; osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ dzen mbordo."
"Nkyii so Uzia totoow aban atsentsen wɔ Jerusalɛm wɔ kutuwdo kuropon no ho
column3: na bɔnsa mu nkuropon no ho
column4: na fasu no no mponee no ho

column2: "Na ɔtotoow aban atsentsen wɔ sar no do
column3: na otutuu nsubura pii
column4: osiandɛ ɔwɔ mbowakuw pii wɔ ɔbɔn no mu na tɛtɛr no mu: na ɔwɔ ekuafo na wenyin turehwɛfo wɔ mbepɔw no do
column5: na nhabamber no mu; osiandɛ ɔpɛ ekuayɛ."

column2: "Nkyii so Uzia ɔwɔ mbarimba ekuafo dɔm a
column3: wotu sa ekuw mu ekuw mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkanee a wɔnam ɔkyerɛwfo Jeiel na ɔhwɛdofo Maaseia do kanee no no dodow tsetsee
column5: wɔ ɔhen no n'asafohemfo no mu baako

column2: "Egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir
column3: mekyerɛ mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam nyinara

column2: "Na hɔn nsaadze na dɔm a wɔatsetse hɔn
column3: mpemahaasa na mpemesuon ahaenum a wɔdze tum kɛse yɛ sa
column4: dze boaa ɔhen no tsiaa atamfo no."

column2: "Na Uzia siesiee akyɛm
column3: na mpeaa
column9: mekyerɛ wɔdze maa dɔm no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ mfir a ɔyɛ edwimfo pa edwin wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: dɛ onsisi aban atsentsen do na akoban do
column4: ma wɔmfa ntotow egyen menaba na abo akɛse nyina. Na ne dzin tahyee kɔr ekyirekyir; osiandɛ wɔboaa no nwanwa mu araa kodur dɛ ɔyɛɛ dzen."

column2: "Na aber a ɔyɛɛ dzen no
column3: nna n'akoma maa noho do ma ɔbɔɔ ɔbrafun
column4: na ɔyɛɛ bɔn tsiaa EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn; osiandɛ ɔnoara sii mu kɔr EWURADZE n'asɔrdan no mu dɛ ɔrekɛhyew eduhuam wɔ eduhuamhyew afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Azaria dzii n'ekyir kɛhɛɛn mu
column3: na EWURADZE n'asɔfoe eduowɔtwe

column2: "na wosiiw ɔhen Uzia kwan
column3: na wɔsee no dɛ
column7: na mbom Aaronmba asɔfo no a wɔayɛ hɔn krɔnkrɔn dɛ wɔnhyew eduhuam no na hɔndze a: fi krɔnkrɔnbea yi do ha fi
column8: na ayɛ bɔn; nkyii so ɔrennyɛ w'enyidzii wɔ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Nna Uzia no bo fuwii; na eduhuamhyew adze no dze ne nsamu dɛ ɔdze rebɛhyew eduhuam; na aber a no bo fuuw asɔfo no
column3: kwata fifiir no momapɔw do wɔ asɔfo no enyim wɔ EWURADZE ne fie hɔ

column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin Azaria
column3: na asɔfo no nyinara
column7: ɔayar kwata wɔ no momapɔw do
column8: na wosunsuun no fii hɔ ntsɛmara; nyew
column9: ɔnoara so yɛɛ ntsɛm fiir edzi

column2: "Na ɔhen Uzia yɛɛ ɔkwatanyi dze kodur no wu da
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa nkyɛn ofi bi mu
column4: ɔyɛ ɔkwatanyi ntsi; osiandɛ woetwa no efi EWURADZE fie: na ne ba Jotam na ɔhwɛɛ ɔhen ne fidua no do
column5: dɛ obuu asaase no do nkorɔfo no atsɛn."

column2: "Afei Uzia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column4: Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia kyerɛwee."

column2: "Nna Uzia kɔr ne nsamankyir; na wokesiee no n'egyanom nkyɛn wɔ haban mu esiei a ɔyɛ ahemfo dze no mu; na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ ɔkwatanyi: na ne babanyin Jotam dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
